microTiPi.epifluorescence

Class WideFieldModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • PsfModel
      • microTiPi.microscopy.MicroscopeModel
        • microTiPi.epifluorescence.WideFieldModel

  • public class WideFieldModel
extends MicroscopeModel
    Compute a 3D point spread function of a wide field fluorescence microscope (WFFM)

    The 3D PSF is modeled after a parameterized pupil function. It is a monochromatic scalar model that defines the 3D PSF h from pupil function p. Both modulus ρ(i,j) and phase φ(i,j) of pupil function p are expressed on a basis of Zernike polynomials Zn.

    A(z) = ρ.exp(iΦ(z)) with Φ(z) = φ + z.ψ where ψ is the defocus function : ψ

    References: [1] Yves Tourneur & Eric Thiébaut, Ferréol Soulez, Loïc Denis. Blind deconvolution of 3d data in wide field fluorescence microscopy.

    Version:
    Author:
    Ferréol Soulez

    • Constructor Detail

      • WideFieldModel

        public WideFieldModel(Shape psfShape,
                      double NA,
                      double lambda,
                      double ni,
                      double dxy,
                      double dz,
                      boolean radial,
                      boolean single)
        Parameters:
        psfShape - shape of the PSF
        NA - numerical aperture
        lambda - wavelength in m
        ni - refractive index of the immersion medium
        dxy - lateral pixel size
        dz - axial sampling step size
        single - single precision flag
        radial - radially symmetric PSF flag

      • WideFieldModel

                      double ni,

                      double dz,
                      boolean radial,
                      boolean single)
        Parameters:
        psfShape - shape of the PSF
        nPhase - number of phase coefficients
        nModulus - number of modulus coefficients
        NA - numerical aperture
        lambda - wavelength in m
        ni - refractive index of the immersion medium
        dxy - lateral pixel size
        dz - axial sampling step size
        single - single precision flag
        radial - radially symmetric PSF flag

      • computePsf

        public void computePsf()
        Compute the point spread function

        h_k(z) = |a_k(z)|² = |Σ_j F_{j,k} A_j(z)|²

        Specified by:
        computePsf in class MicroscopeModel

      • setDefocus

        public void setDefocus(DoubleShapedVector defoc)
        Update the defocus function according the parameters
        Parameters:
        defoc - . Depending on the number of elements of defocus: 3 : defoc = {n_i / \lambda, \delta_x, \delta_y} 2 : defoc = { \delta_x, \delta_y} 1 : defoc = {n_i / \lambda}

      • setModulus

        public void setModulus(DoubleShapedVector modulus)
        Compute the modulus ρ on a Zernike polynomial basis

        The coefficients β are normalized and the modulus is ρ = Σ_n β_n Z_n

        Parameters:
        modulus - Zernike coefficients
